name: Ann Heard Voices
description:
Pain.
Chaos.
Suffering.
Hatred.
Death.

All now live in fear of the PUN-DEMIC.

Who could have brought such suffering to the whole world?

The answer to mankind's ANN-ihilation lies ANN-known to everyone else, miserably bearing the burden of the PUNDITS, all ANN her own.

All because ofANN HEARD VOICES
_____________________________________________________________________________________________
